input.sentences: at the party everyone had brought their guitars .
they played all the songs that they knew .
the family sat and listened to the play .
then everyone sat and shared stories with each other .
after that the kids sat to play video games .
output.sentences: What makes a party is the guitars these guys brought.
Songs were played in an acoustic setting.
People sat to watch them play while others listened.
Many had stories that were shared while we sat around.
Video games appeal to others who sat to watch this brat play.
